properties.title: Water Fountain
properties.author: Cameron, Lucy, Lea Joe, Boswell, McBryde
properties.content: 6) Water Fountain: If there are 100 total gallons of water stored in the water fountain, and your class drinks 37 gallons in a week, how many gallons of water are left over in the fountain at the end of the week? Solution: 100 – 37 = 63 gallons.

properties.title: Swing Set in the Playground
properties.author: Cameron, Lucy, Lea Joe, Boswell, McBryde
properties.content: 5) Swing Set (in the playground): Joe jumps off the swing a total of 84 times. If he jumps off and lands on his feet 46 times, how many times did Cam jump off and not land on his feet? Solution: 84 – 46 = 38 times.

properties.title: Slide in the Playground
properties.author: Cameron, Lucy, Lea Joe, Boswell, McBryde
properties.content: 4) Slide (in the playground): Lea slides down the slide 47. Cam slides down the slide 33 times. How many times total did Lea and Cam slide down the slide? Solution: 47 + 33 = 80 times.

properties.title: Football Sled
properties.author: Cameron, Lucy, Lea Joe, Boswell, McBryde
properties.content: 3) Football Sled: How many dummies (the leather pads) are on this sled? Answer:5. If there are 5 dummies on this sled, and we want a sled with 32 dummies, how many dummies would we need to add? Solution: 32 – 5 = 27 dummies.

properties.title: Big Tree
properties.author: Cameron, Lucy, Lea Joe, Boswell, McBryde
properties.content: 2) Big Tree (by the fence at the edge of campus): Suppose a tree loses 527 leaves in the fall, but grows 400 more in the spring, how many leaves total does the tree lose? Solution: 527 – 400 = 127 leaves.

properties.title: Basketball Hoop
properties.author: Cameron, Lucy, Lea Joe, Boswell, McBryde
properties.content: 1) Basketball Hoop: If there are 15 feet between the baseline of a basketball court (the line below the hoop) and the free throw line, and 27 feet between the free throw line and the half-court line, how many feet total are there between the baseline and the half-court line? Solution: 15 + 27 = 42 feet.
